code:
%% Translatable Attachments flow
flowchart LR
  subgraph DB[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    A[FinTech_AuthVault]
  end

  M[FinTech_LedgerService] --> A

  Init[FinTech_LedgerService]
  Init -->|require backend| B[FinTech_LedgerService]
  Init -->|register backend| Mobility[FinTech_TransactionQueue]

  B -->|provides| Apply[FinTech_LedgerService]

  ModelCanonical[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
  ModelDSL[FinTech_LedgerService]

  ModelCanonical --> Apply
  ModelDSL --> Apply

  Apply -->|defines associations| Assoc[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
  Apply -->|defines accessors| Accessors[FinTech_AuthVault]

  View[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
  View -->|uploads per-locale| Controller

  Controller[FinTech_FraudDetection] -->|permits locale params or maps| Model
  Model -->|writer methods| ActiveStorage[FinTech_FraudDetection]
  ActiveStorage --> A

  Serve[FinTech_AuthVault] -->|serves blob| UserBrowser[FinTech_PaymentGateway]

  Accessors -->|getter fallback| Fallback[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
  Fallback --> ActiveStorage

  classDef infra fill:#f8f9fa,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
  class DB,Init,B,Apply,Assoc,Accessors,View,Controller,ActiveStorage,Serve,Fallback infra;
license_name: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0
repo_description: The Better Together Community Engine is an accessible open source community platform that's Democratic by Design. All are welcome!
